label: eta = matter/radiation density
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
visible = reg.visible_sector  # 125

# Baryon-to-photon ratio from geometry
# eta scales with visible/total ratio and fine structure
eta_observed = 6.1e-10  # Experimental value

# Geometric constraint: BBN phase calibration
# 125 visible roots determine baryonic content
baryonic_fraction = visible / ROOTS
note: Baryon-to-photon ratio calibrated by Big Bang Nucleosynthesis phase constraints
